title: Winning feels bad, losing feels bad.
body:
Games in a bad state when winning feels as bad as losing. Just saying.

Just upvote this shit. The powers that be don't give a shit. Even if they did, I don't think they could fix it. lol

I mean... we have to assume they are TRYING to fix it, right? Hard to tell.

If you are wondering what... well there are lots of things, ranked matching is at the top of my list.

replies.body: No they havent fixed it for 5 seasons I quit the game for that reason. There is no reason to win no reason to lose. The players are weeb weirdos who will just feed/be brain dead on command. Nobody cares about winning or losing. Shitty game for shitty people. Learned that years ago. Cant even play normals without wanting to spit on the nearest riot games employee.
